sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const economicsContent = (

IGCSE Economics (0455) Full Notes

1. The Basic Economic Problem

  • Understanding scarcity, choice, and opportunity cost
  • Resources and factors of production
  • Production possibility curves
  • Resource allocation and economic systems

2. The Allocation of Resources

  • How markets operate: demand, supply, equilibrium
  • Elasticity of demand and supply
  • Price system, market failure, externalities
  • Government intervention

3. Microeconomic Decision Makers

  • Role of households, workers, trade unions
  • Banking system and commercial banks
  • Firms: costs, revenue, profit, competition

4. Government and the Macroeconomy

  • Macroeconomic aims and indicators
  • Fiscal, monetary, and supply-side policy
  • Economic growth, unemployment, inflation

5. Economic Development

  • Differences between growth and development
  • Indicators of living standards and poverty
  • Causes and effects of population changes
  • Developing vs developed economies

6. International Trade and Globalisation

  • Trade, globalisation, exchange rates
  • Balance of payments
  • Protectionism vs free trade
  • Role of international organisations
); export default economicsContent;
